Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.

English.Char_Desc_80: The famous puzzle "Rubik's Cube" - now on your computer.
English.Char_Desc_250: The famous puzzle "Rubik's Cube" - now on your computer. Can you solve it? It depends on your intelligence - try it and show what you can do. In addition to standard 3x3 cube also available other options: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 or even 2x2!
English.Char_Desc_450: The famous puzzle "Rubik's Cube" - now on your computer. Can you solve it? It depends on your intelligence - try it and show what you can do. In addition to standard 3x3 cube also available other options for the most hardened: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 or even 2x2!
English.Char_Desc_2000: The famous puzzle "Rubik's Cube" - now on your computer. Can you solve it? It depends on your intelligence - try it and show what you can do. In addition to standard 3x3 cube also available other options for the most hardened: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 or even 2x2! The game has a user-friendly interface and intuitive control: you can rotate cube around any axis and rotate its faces by mouse. The game also supports cubes of different sizes: from 2x2 to 7x7. You can cancel your last move, mix up the cube and reset it to initial state.

Russian.Char_Desc_450: Знаменитая головоломка "Кубик Рубика" - теперь на вашем компьютере. Сумеете ли вы собрать его? Это зависит от ваших умственных способностей - пройдите испытание и покажите на что вы способны. Помимо стандартного кубика 3x3 доступны также другие варианты для самых закаленных: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 и даже 2x2!
Russian.Char_Desc_80: Знаменитая головоломка "Кубик Рубика" - теперь на вашем компьютере.

Это зависит от ваших умственных способностей - пройдите испытание и покажите на что вы способны. Помимо стандартного кубика 3x3 доступны также другие варианты для самых закаленных: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 и даже 2x2!
